title: JavaScript Level 9 â€” Array Filtering & Counting
concept: Process arrays to filter elements and count based on conditions.

challenges.title: Print Even Numbers in Array
challenges.description: Given N and an array of N integers, print all even numbers in the array in the same order, separated by spaces.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: All even numbers separated by a single space. If no even numbers, print nothing.

challenges.title: Count Numbers Greater Than X
challenges.description: Given N, an array of N integers and a value X, count how many elements are strictly greater than X.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers. Third line: X.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: count of elements > X.
